Fit the reservoir hose to the master cylinder.
The rear brake switch cable should route between the frame and the brake hose when fully installed. Failure to do this could result in heat damage to the rear brake switch cable.

Routing the rear brake switch cable as noted for removal, position the rear brake switch moulding over the pin on the master cylinder and slide upwards. Ensure the brake switch pin contacts with the master cylinder push rod plate and the arm of the switch moulding is positioned around the push rod.
